title: HELP
body: So when I choose my hero and am at the loading screen before I actually enter Summoners Rift or whatever, my game crashes. Like it loads the screens one screen at a time instead of fluently. The problem is, my computer has way beyond the requirements of league (12gb ram and 8th gen core i5 processor) but nothing is working. Ive uninstalled and dowloaded three times and nothing has changed. And because my game crashes im now being punished an being put into freaking low priority queue. HELP PLS

replies.body: Is it a bugsplat?  Something like drivers or game files could be failing to render the game.  The steps in the [game crash](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes+) guide should help but test it in a custom game first.
